actionConfiguration.body:
query AssignmentActualEmployeeAssignment($email: String) {
    people_assignment(where: { employee: { workemail: { _eq: $email } } }) {
      festcloudid
      employeefestcloudid
      enddate
      manager
      role
      jobtitle
      startdate
      positionfestcloudid
      workgroupfestcloudid
      workgroup {
        festcloudid
        workgroupfestcloudid
        name
        status
        type
        parent {
          festcloudid
          workgroupfestcloudid
          name
          status
          type
          parent {
            festcloudid
            workgroupfestcloudid
            name
            status
            type
            parent {
              festcloudid
              workgroupfestcloudid
              name
              status
              type
            }
          }
        }
      }
      position {
        festcloudid
        positionname
      }
      employee {
        festcloudid
        firstemploymentdate
        photolink
        stage
        workemail
        workmobilephone
        workstationaryphone
        person {
          birthday
          email
          mobilephone
          familyname
          festcloudid
          gender
          middlename
          name
        }
      }
    }
  }
